name: Space Game (daniele100)
description:
SPACE GAME

Space Game is a little game for the Boundless Game Jam. In this game you are a little astronaut and your goal is to destroy all the asteroids that will come against you.

CONTROLS:

In this game you only have to shoot, to shoot press over the screen with the touch or your mouse:

TOUCH/MOUSE CLICK = SHOOT

CREDITS:

IDEA: DANIELE100

DEVELOPMENT: DANIELE100

GRAPHICS: DANIELE100

MUSIC: DJ RED RAYNE

SOUND: DANIELE100
